wikipedia_page.main: Hosein Khajeh-Hosseiny (born 1964) is a British private equity investor, venture capitalist and philanthropist. He is the founder and Chairman of Open X Innovations LLC, an asset management firm, and Trinity AgTech, a digital agriculture company headquartered in London, U.K.
